title: Hardware Master Contract
bid_submission_type: Purchase Order Request for Proposal (PORFP) responses will only be accepted through the State's eMaryland Marketplace Advantage (eMMA) e-Procurement system. Bids will not be accepted by email, fax, U.S. Mail, or hand delivery.
term_of_bid: Please allow proposals/quotes provided in response to this PORFP to be valid for at least 90 days after the set due date above.
product: Dell Latitude 5550, Dell Thunderbolt 4 Dock – WD22TB4
bid_summary: Purchase Order Request for Proposals (PORFP) for hardware under the Master Contract. Includes laptops, docks, and extended warranties.
